description:
Iruma, Asmodeus, and Clara end up in the Misfit Class. As the name suggests, the class is filled with a bunch of misfits and Sabnock Sabro, who wants to become the next Demon King, declares Iruma his rival. Their classes start and their first lesson is a flying race. The race was to take place in the Warbling Valley and the Cutthroat Valley. Apparently, there’s also a demon bird that lives there...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 問題児[アブノーマル]クラス
